member.name: T:ATINV.Business.FundBusiness
member.summary: The class that manipulates Fund objects, implementing IFundBusines interface.

member.name: M:ATINV.Business.IFundBusiness.List
member.summary: Returns an object containing the code response for the request and the list of Funds, if the request were successful, or a list of messages describing a problem, if failed.

member.name: M:ATINV.Business.IMovimentBusiness.Save(ATINV.Model.Moviment)
member.summary: Saves a Moviment object and returns an object containing the code response for the request and the saved object, if the request were successful, or a list of messages describing a problem, if failed.

member.name: T:ATINV.Business.MovimentBusiness
member.summary: The class that manipulates Moviment objects.

member.name: M:ATINV.Business.MovimentBusiness.Save(ATINV.Model.Moviment)
member.summary: Validates and, if successful, saves a Moviment object.
member.param: Moviment object, representing a redemption or application moviment.
